sentences.en: As in the current Fukushima disaster, there was no fuel to cremate huge Numbers of bodies.
sentences.cn: 就像目前发生的福岛灾难一样，根本没有燃料火化大量的尸体。

sentences.en: “You can’t cremate any kind of electronic device like a cell phone or hearing aid or pacemaker,” says Perman.
sentences.cn: 不能和手机、助听器、心脏起搏器这样的电子产品,一起火化。
